text: Talk with your doctor about clinical trials that may be right for you. General information about clinical trials is available from the NCI website.       Pilocytic Astrocytomas    Treatment of pilocytic astrocytomas may include the following:            -  Surgery to remove the tumor. Radiation therapy may also be given if tumor remains after surgery.           Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with adult pilocytic astrocytoma.
